Title: Emerald Summons
Description:
Merithra, the current leader of the green dragons, wishes for you to meet her in the Emerald Gardens.

Drakonid emissaries from the azure flight have come to learn about the gardens. Things have not always been peaceful with the blue dragons, so it is important to her that relations are kept cordial and positive.

She is on her perch above the Shady Sanctuary in the Emerald Gardens, at Merithra's Watch.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Merithra at Merithra's Watch in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Merithra at Merithra's Watch in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
